appearance.value: A lover of classical pop music from the 1980s, Dudge was run out of the Three World Empire for disobeying orders.  He joined the UPP as a mercenary, married and made a life, becoming a naturalized UPP citizen in 2170.
appearance.label: appearance

agenda.value: He has no political axe to grind and supports the aims of the Great Mother Mission.  However, General Ozolinski is using Dudge's wife and child, in cryosleep aboard Ìyánlá, as a lever to get Dudge to feed useful information back to the UPP.  He doesn't want to betray his shipmates, but his family will always come first.
agenda.label: agenda

system.notes:
CREW: PILOT ANDI “DUDGE” DUDGEON

A lover of classical pop music from the 1980s, Dudge was run out of the Three World Empire for disobeying orders. He joined the UPP as a mercenary, married and made a life, becoming a naturalized UPP citizen in 2170.

He has no political axe to grind and supports the aims of the Great Mother Mission. However, General Ozolinski is using Dudge's wife and child, in cryosleep aboard Ìyánlá, as a lever to get Dudge to feed useful information back to the UPP. He doesn't want to betray his shipmates, but his family will always come first.

As the campaign progresses Dudge will find this harder and harder to do, and the stress will show. If the PCs are kind to him, he may relent and tell them the UPP are using him as a spy. Dudge does not know about the UPP's plans to take control of the Great Mother Mission.

items.name: Like the Back of Your Hand

comment.value: This vehicle is yours, and you know every bolt and calbe, nook and cranny. Choose one vehicle or spacecraft (not one type, but a single, specific craft). You get a +2 modification to Piloting with the chosen vehicle. You can choose this talent several times, once for each vehicle.
comment.label: Text

items.name: Presidium Mark VIII Advanced SE Suit

comment.value:
Base Armor Rating is 2.  Optional iridium coated vest adds an additional +1 to Armor.  Built-in comm unit.  Exoskeleton adds +1 to STRENGTH-based rolls. Built-in High-Beam Shoulder Lamp.

Originally designed for Peter Weyland's 2091 Prometheus mission, these nano-reinforced composite helmet and cadmium exoskeleton-equipped, form-fitting space suits are used for Geholgod Institute funded expeditions.  The exoskeleton gives a +1 modification to all STRENGTH-based skill rolls.  The Presidium Mk II-VIII all have dual video feeds from helmet and body cams.  The helmet's HUD tracks vital stats, environmental conditions, communications systems and data analysis.  An iridium-coated, laser-resistant light-weight armor vest can be added to the suit for an extra cost.
comment.label: Text

comment.value: This updated version of the Rexim EVA Pistol is slowly being distributed to the Weyland-Yutani commercial fleet.  An RXF-M5A3 comes standard with a LAG light dial to increase damage and a 4x20 scope—if the scope is removed, the pistol has no bonus.
comment.label: Text

comment.value: These emergency pistols can be found on nearly all military and civilian atmospheric vehicles.  Fired straight up into the air, an intensely bright M72A1 Starshell flare will illuminate one zone for D6 Rounds.  The pistol can be used as a weapon in a pinch—if a Starshell is fired directly at a human target, any critical injury inflicted will be #15.
comment.label: Text

appearance.value: Jovial, light-hearted but committed to her task, she is the great granddaughter of the legendary J.V. Gorham.  At 22 years old, the pirate leader has the legacy of her family to live up to.  Her grandfather and father were responsible for taking the fight to the Perfected.
appearance.label: appearance

system.notes:
CAPTAIN J.V.  GORHAM III

Jovial, light-hearted but committed to her task, she is the great granddaughter of the legendary J.V.  Gorham.  At 22 years old, the pirate leader has the legacy of her family to live up to.  Her grandfather and father were responsible for taking the fight to the Perfected.

comment.value: You are used to taking a beating. You increase your health by +2, i.e. your maximum number is equal to your Strength plus 2.
comment.label: Text

comment.value:
ARMOR PIERCING.

Less than 3 STR causes -1 modifier to RANGED WEAPONS.

Named after the pioneer colonist who made it popular, this handgun fires heavy high-velocity slugs capable of delivering devastating damage.  The recoil and muzzle blast are rough on anyone with a STR less than 3—causing a -1 modification to their RANGED COMBAT roll when firing it.
comment.label: Text

comment.value:
Stun effect (-2).  (Range Medium when used as a hand grenade.)

These grenades are called "electronic ballbreakers" with good reason. When deployed, they propel themselves about 3 feet off the ground before releasing a mega-voltage electric pulse. The usually non-lethal shock is still strong enough to freeze a person's central nervous system. These weapons are good for crowd control. When there is only one seat left on the last shuttle to leave a space station stuck in a decaying orbit around a gas giant, pop a few of these puppies into the mob, cycle that airlock closed, and strap yourself in for the ride home. All humans in the target zone must make a hard Stamina roll (-2, doesn't count as an action) or be stunned for one round.
comment.label: Text

appearance.value: UPP through and through, the grizzled Koblenz is a staunch man of the People and covert MSS operative.
appearance.label: appearance

agenda.value: He cares deeply that the little folk should be rewarded for hard work well done. He knows about the UPP's plans to take control of the Far Spinward Colonies but will resist any attempt to get information out of him.
agenda.label: agenda

system.notes:
CREW: MECHANIC DAVOR KOBLENZ

UPP through and through, the grizzled Koblenz is a staunch man of the People and covert MSS operative. He cares deeply that the little folk should be rewarded for hard work well done. He knows about the UPP's plans to take control of the Far Spinward Colonies but will resist any attempt to get information out of him. When the time comes for the UPP to take control, how Koblenz behaves towards the PCs will depend on how the PCs have treated him during the campaign.

comment.value: Life on the Frontier is a constant struggle. Luckily, you have what it takes to overcome anything that comes your way. You can push any skill roll based on Strength twice, not just once like other characters. Each push increases your Stress Level by one.
comment.label: Text

comment.value: These thermal-regulating undersuits come in a variety of blues, grays, and emergency oranges.  They add a +1 modification to STAMINA when resisting heat, cold, and vacuum.
comment.label: Text

items.name: Weyland ES-7 Supernova Dual-Action Electrostatic Shockgun

comment.value:
Stun effect, armor piercing.

These electrostatic kinetic energy projectile weapons fire armor piercing rounds that carry a stun charge. Any human target that suffers damage from an attack must make a hard STAMINA roll (−2, doesn’t count as an action) or be stunned for one Round, unable to act.
comment.label: Text

comment.value: This set of heavy mining equipment adds a +2 modification to any mining related HEAVY MACHINERY roll. It includes hammers, wrenches, chisels, and pickaxes—many of which can be used as weapons in a pinch.
comment.label: Text

appearance.value: Quintana is an independent contractor, although she hails from the UA city of Zihuatanejo.
appearance.label: appearance

agenda.value: She distrusts any big corporation and has little interest in politics. Her job is to prospect and assess colonies for commercial potential and development, but she just wants to get rich and doesn't care who she tramples to do it.
agenda.label: agenda

system.notes:
CREW: PROSPECTOR EMILY QUINTANA

Quintana is an independent contractor, although she hails from the UA city of Zihuatanejo. She distrusts any big corporation and has little interest in politics. Her job is to prospect and assess colonies for commercial potential and development, but she just wants to get rich and doesn't care who she tramples to do it.

As the campaign progresses, she will keep an eye on how the PCs behave—are they hoarding finds just for themselves? If they are, Quintana will eventually demand to be cut into their scam or she will report them to the ICC authorities.

comment.value: When you are Broken, you can get back on your feet immediately, without anyone give you first aid. Roll for Stamina. For every Success you roll, you get one Health point back and can keep fighting a little while longer. This talent can only be used once per Turn, and has no effect against critical injuries.
comment.label: Text

comment.value: The plastic suit provides protection from biochemical contaminants as long as no damage has pierced it.  Biohazard suits have a built-in comm unit and Air Supply 2.  They do not protect against the vacuum of space.
comment.label: Text

comment.value:
This Chemical Biological Radiological and Nuclear Detection Kit includes a Geiger counter, a biological and chemical agent diagnostic device, four doses of neurotoxin inhibitors, four emergency respirators (good for one Turn each before they need to be recharged), a pair of acid proof gloves and goggles, syringes, sampling tools, chemical detection paper, and four heat resistant specimen jars.

Using this kit automatically detects the current Radiation Level and any chemical or biological pathogen at the user’s location. 

It also gives the user a +2 modification to any Sickness Roll.
comment.label: Text

notes.notes:
This Chemical Biological Radiological and Nuclear Detection Kit includes a Geiger counter, a biological and chemical agent diagnostic device, four doses of neurotoxin inhibitors, four emergency respirators (good for one Turn each before they need to be recharged), a pair of acid proof gloves and goggles, syringes, sampling tools, chemical detection paper, and four heat resistant specimen jars.

 

Using this kit automatically detects the current Radiation Level and any chemical or biological pathogen at the user’s location. 

 

It also gives the user a +2 modification to any Sickness Roll.

appearance.value: Austere and haughty, but compassionate, Ozolinski is a career UPP soldier, having risen from the enlisted ranks to high command.
appearance.label: appearance

agenda.value: He knows that conflict is a necessary evil, but regrets that young lives must be shattered through it—he witnessed much death and suffering as a young SOF soldier. He wishes that the Great Mother Mission could have progressed as a collaboration, but this will not stop him giving the order to take control.
agenda.label: agenda

system.notes:
GENERAL NURLAN OZOLINSKI

Austere and haughty, but compassionate, Ozolinski is a career UPP soldier, having risen from the enlisted ranks to high command. He knows that conflict is a necessary evil, but regrets that young lives must be shattered through it—he witnessed much death and suffering as a young SOF soldier. He wishes that the Great Mother Mission could have progressed as a collaboration, but this will not stop him giving the order to take control. However, if the PCs can convince him of the threat presented by the Perfected (with an opposed MANIPULATION test) he will order his men to defend the UNCSS Ìyánlá first, before resolving the political infighting of the mission itself.

comment.value: You can use Command to give orders in combat as a fast action instead of a slow action. This is effect means you can give orders twice in the same Round.
comment.label: Text

comment.value: With rank comes certain priviliges-being obeyed is one of them. You can push any skill roll based on Empathy twice, not just once like other characters. Each push increases your Stress Level by one.
comment.label: Text

comment.value:
ARMOR PIERCING.

The most recent of the Grach series, the 4043 has overcome some of the earlier design flaws that made this the most beautiful but most under-performing pistol in the SOF armory.  The 4043 is the pinnacle of UPP small arms design, carried by senior officers who are forced to earn the right to use one.
comment.label: Text

notes.notes: A relatively lightweight vest made of woven metal fibers, the Kevlar Riot Vest is the personnel armor of choice for law enforcement and security details throughout the colonies. It offers limited protection from bullets, knives, and shrapnel.

appearance.value: Amir was a Royal Marine before joining the expedition.
appearance.label: appearance

agenda.value: Resourceful and strong-willed, she is disgusted that the New Albion Protectorate has had the audacity to break away from the 3WE. She hasn't confronted Monroe on her views, for the good of the crew and the expedition, but she's had to bite her tongue.
agenda.label: agenda

system.notes:
CREW: SECURITY HAMIDAH AMIR

Amir was a Royal Marine before joining the expedition. Resourceful and strong-willed, she is disgusted that the New Albion Protectorate has had the audacity to break away from the 3WE. She hasn't confronted Monroe on her views, for the good of the crew and the expedition, but she's had to bite her tongue.

As the campaign progresses, she can't wait to get home and put the NAPRO back in its box, at the point of her rifle. With Lakota Monroe getting increasingly vocal in support of the NAPRO, Amir gets angrier.  She will use force to make Monroe shut her mouth.

comment.value: When the going gets tough, the tough get going, and you're the toughest badass around. You can push any skill roll based on Strength twice, not just once like other characters. Each push increases your Stress Level by one.
comment.label: Text

comment.value:
Built-in comm unit.

Standard issue for the USCMC, the M3 consists of a rigid armor padded vest, a flexible ballistic pad that covers the abdomen, and clamshell greaves on the lower legs. The armor protects against edged weapons and glancing blows from high powered ammunition. It has a built-in comm unit and Personal Data Transmitter, combat webbing straps to connect a variety of equipment, and contact points which monitor the wearer's vitals and transmit them to a tactical monitoring station. Armor rating 6.
comment.label: Text

comment.value:
Armor piercing, full auto, grenade launcher.

The standard issue weapon of the USCMC, the M41A Pulse Rifle is a 10mm automatic assault rifle with underslung 30mm pump-action grenade launcher combined in a sturdy housing with retractable stock and optional scope. The M41A fires explosive-tip caseless standard light armor-piercing US M309 rounds accelerated via electronic pulse. Remaining ammo is tracked via an LED counter and the rifle has two firing modes-burst and full automatic. An otherwise reliable weapon, the M41A can jam when fully-loaded, so partially loaded magazines are recommended. (In their downtime on missions, Marines will take the time to remove a few rounds from each of the magazines they carry.) Even with this flaw, the M41A is what you want slung over your shoulder-but if you are a civilian, good luck getting a permit to own one.
comment.label: Text

items.name: Weyland ES-7 Supernova Dual-Action Electrostatic Shockgun

comment.value:
Stun effect, armor piercing.

These electrostatic kinetic energy projectile weapons fire armor piercing rounds that carry a stun charge. Any human target that suffers damage from an attack must make a hard STAMINA roll (−2, doesn’t count as an action) or be stunned for one Round, unable to act.
comment.label: Text

appearance.value: Blatchman is a career ICC Inspector.
appearance.label: appearance

agenda.value: He's heartily fed up with the likes of Weyland-Yutani flagrantly disregarding the rules and regulations, then laughing and getting off scot-free when they get caught.
agenda.label: agenda

system.notes:
CREW: ICC INSPECTOR TAN BLATCHMAN

Blatchman is a career ICC Inspector. He's heartily fed up with the likes of Weyland-Yutani flagrantly disregarding the rules and regulations, then laughing and getting off scot-free when they get caught. He is determined to see that this boat follows the letter of the law and has a clean record, and damn what the others on board have to say about it.

comment.value: You get a +2 modification to Mobility when using the skill to move undetected.
comment.label: Text

comment.value: These thermal-regulating undersuits come in a variety of blues, grays, and emergency oranges.  They add a +1 modification to STAMINA when resisting heat, cold, and vacuum.
comment.label: Text

comment.value:
Troubleshoot computer systems.

the SSDD is used to troubleshoot computer and mechanical systems aboard a space station or starship. A good engineer knows how to use one of these to hack doors and computer terminals-but you didn't read that here (Comtech +2)
comment.label: Text

comment.value: Comtech +1.
comment.label: Text

appearance.value: Monroe is proud of her ancient native Māori heritage, and her success within the 3WE hierarchy.
appearance.label: appearance

agenda.value: However, she openly approves of the New Albion Protectorate breaking away from the 3WE.  She has no love for the UPP and will oppose them at every turn.  Her role on the ship is that of counselor, medic, negotiator, and ambassador.
agenda.label: agenda

system.notes:
CREW: COUNSELOR LAKOTA MONROE

Monroe is proud of her ancient native Māori heritage, and her success within the 3WE hierarchy.

However, she openly approves of the New Albion Protectorate breaking away from the 3WE.  She has no love for the UPP and will oppose them at every turn. Her role on the ship is that of counselor, medic, negotiator, and ambassador.

As the campaign progresses and she sees the carnage that is the Far Spinward Colonies after the 3WE abandoned them, she will become increasingly disillusioned and angry with the 3WE, disobeying orders and picking fights with 3WE shipmates.

comment.value: With rank comes certain priviliges-being obeyed is one of them. You can push any skill roll based on Empathy twice, not just once like other characters. Each push increases your Stress Level by one.
comment.label: Text

comment.value: A Personal Medkit contains what you need to stop bleeding, disinfect a wound and cauterize it, some Pharmax bandages to wrap it up and a stim boost to keep you on your feet. A Medkit is not a permanent solution, it's more of a band aid to keep your guts from spilling out until you reach an Auto-Doc. Gives a +2 modification to Medical Aid rolls but can only be used once.
comment.label: Text

comment.value:
Coordinate info for fields teams.

A personal data tablet, a P-DAT can be synced with Spectrograph Mapping Devices, PDT's, and helmet cams to coordinate a team on the go.
comment.label: Text

appearance.value:
HYPERDYNE SERIES 120A/3 SYNTHETIC & STAGE II BIOMECHANOID ABOMINATION
Single-minded and guarded, but curious, Mother Ma'Kayla took on the leadership of the Children of the Two Divines after the previous leader, Mother Mishka, disappeared.  Ma'Kayla led the Children to Perfected Space, where she was infected with a variant strain of 26 Draconis and has now developed into a Stage II Abomination unlike most strains of the black pathogen, this variant affects synthetics as well as humans. She is a willing agent of the Fulfremmen and is on her way to enlightened perfection—her skull has subtly extended, and her arms and legs have increased in bulk and length. 
However, she still retains mental control and her love of ancient Earth poetry.
appearance.label: appearance

system.notes:
HYPERDYNE SERIES 120A/3 SYNTHETIC & STAGE II BIOMECHANOID ABOMINATION

Single-minded and guarded, but curious, Mother Ma'Kayla took on the leadership of the Children of the Two Divines after the previous leader, Mother Mishka, disappeared. Ma'Kayla led the Children to Perfected Space, where she was infected with a variant strain of 26 Draconis and has now developed into a Stage II Abomination unlike most strains of the black pathogen, this variant affects synthetics as well as humans. She is a willing agent of the Fulfremmen and is on her way to enlightened perfection—her skull has subtly extended, and her arms and legs have increased in bulk and length.  However, she still retains mental control and her love of ancient Earth poetry.

A NOTE FROM MU/TH/UR: As a Mutated Abomination, Ma' Kayla cannot use EMPATHY-based skills, firearms, or other technological items, and is immune to MANIPULATION.  She suffers damage as an android.

attributes.modules: 8 x size V, 12 x size IV, 16 x size III
attributes.armaments: 5 x size III, 10 x size I

system.notes:
UNCSS ÌYÁNLÁ

The UNCSS Ìyánlá is a Lockmart and Welsun Type 3300B Deucalion-class X modular colony carrier, coming in at 2,550m in length, with a beam of 450m and draft of 300m. This state-of-the-art long-range spacecraft carries four externally mounted Atmospheric Processor Plant modules, four ring-mounted Magellan-­class J Space Exploration Vehicles, as well as numerous drop-shuttles, support craft, and ground vehicles. Three “spines” run the length of the vessel, with transit systems for crew and equipment.

ARMAMENTS:
Ìyánlá is a colony vessel and as such has no offensive armaments. Those it possesses are either defensive or configured to support surface terraforming operations. She has two CIWS Laser Arrays and ten Sensor Decoys along her length, for point defense against incoming threats, and three Tactical Nuke hardpoints, for environmental terraforming purposes only.

comment.value: AIR SCRUBBERS: Machinery needed to supply the crew with breathable air. Carbon filters clean pollutants from the air while churning machines elec- trolyze the water and generate oxygen. Air scrubbers come in many sizes and price levels, depending on how many people they need to keep supplied.
comment.label: Text

comment.value: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE: An advanced computer mainframe, capable of running the ship when the crew is in cryo sleep. Weyland-Yutani’s MU/TH/UR and Seegson’s A.P.O.L.L.O. are the two most popular models.
comment.label: Text

comment.value: CARGO BAY: An internal cargo hold with external loading doors. Cargo doors are typically included, and larger cargo bays include movable H-frame cranes to assist loading. The maximum load and cost of the cargo bay depends on the size of the cargo bay module.
comment.label: Text

comment.value: CARGO BAY: An internal cargo hold with external loading doors. Cargo doors are typically included, and larger cargo bays include movable H-frame cranes to assist loading. The maximum load and cost of the cargo bay depends on the size of the cargo bay module.
comment.label: Text

comment.value: CRYO DEC K: A room with cryo chambers for the crew. The capacity and cost of the cryo deck depends on the size of the module.
comment.label: Text

comment.value: GALLEY: This is where you’ll chow down on those prefab meals after weeks in hypersleep. Includes a simple kitchen, refrigeration unit, and a coffee maker. The capacity and cost of the galley depends on the size of the module.
comment.label: Text

comment.value: MEDLAB: An infirmary and laboratory that typically includes surgical kits, medkits and a selection of medical drugs. If you can afford an AutoDoc or even a Pauling MedPod, this is where you’ll place it.
comment.label: Text

comment.value: SALVAGE CRANE : A powerful crane mech- anism that lets you salvage starship wrecks and space junk, pulling it into your cargo hold or attaching it to your tractor hitch.
comment.label: Text

comment.value: SCIENCE LAB : A highly advanced laboratory where your scientist can examine specimens of alien life forms—among other things. The lab comes with an assortment of equipment, giving a +2 modification to OBSERVATION rolls when using the Analysis talent.
comment.label: Text

comment.value: VEHICLE BAY: A glorified garage for ground vehicles, including a loading ramp for easy access. How many vehicles the bay can accommodate depends on the size of the module.
comment.label: Text

comment.value:
Most starships, space stations, and military facilities are run via a sophisticated computer system called MU/TH/UR. Originally developed by Weyland Corporation at the end of the 21st century, the MU/TH/UR system soon became the standard for running complex automated systems and facilities. Affectionately nicknamed “Mother” by the crews who utilize these computers, over the decades various models have sported different levels of AI packages. While both the MU/TH/UR 1000 and 9000 series are sophisticated interactive models that over time can develop rudimentary personalities, most military, cargo, and utilitarian craft of today are equipped with the standard 5000 through 8000 series.
While these machines can communicate through the ship’s intercom system, most of them can only be directly accessed through the computer core. Card and punch code entry to this secure and static free chamber is only
granted to the vessel’s commanding officer. The computer core also allows the commanding officer to issue alternate commands and overrides to "Mother’s" automated routine.
comment.label: Text

comment.value: CIWS LASER ARRAY: The defensive counter- measure CIWS—Close in Weapons System—is a laser array designed to target and shoot down incoming missiles, and even railgun rounds.
comment.label: Text

comment.value: SENSOR DECOYS: These devices register false radar signatures to confuse weapons.
comment.label: Text

comment.value:
Missile cost: $1,000,000

TACTICAL NUKES: Shipborne nukes are deployed from orbit to destroy planetary based targets, even entire colonies. A 50-megaton nuke will completely destroy all buildings and kill all living beings within a 10 km radius, and cause damage to buildings and people up to 100 km away from the center of detonation. In addition, a high-altitude detonation will create an electromagnetic pulse that destroys unshielded electronics. A nuclear missile battery can typically fit five missiles. Individual missiles must be purchased separately.
comment.label: Text

comment.value: HANGAR: Allows smaller ships to land in the belly of yours. Includes a system of airlocks, to allow entry without decompressing the entire ship. How many other ships the hangar can accommodate depends on the size of the module.
comment.label: Text

comment.value: HANGAR: Allows smaller ships to land in the belly of yours. Includes a system of airlocks, to allow entry without decompressing the entire ship. How many other ships the hangar can accommodate depends on the size of the module.
comment.label: Text

comment.value: VEHICLE BAY: A glorified garage for ground vehicles, including a loading ramp for easy access. How many vehicles the bay can accommodate depends on the size of the module.
comment.label: Text

comment.value: DOCKING UMBILICAL: An airlock and extendable umbilical tunnel that enables docking with other ships. A ship without a docking station must land inside a hangar, or let smaller ships into its own hangar, for the crew to enter or exit the ship.
comment.label: Text

comment.value: Externally mounted Atmospheric Processor Plant modules
comment.label: Text

attributes.modules: 4 x size III, 6 x size II, 8 x size I
attributes.armaments: 2 x size II, 3 x size I

system.notes:
UNCSS SOLOVETSKY ISLAND

The UNCSS Solovetsky Island is one of four identical vessels on the Great Mother Mission, along with the UNCSS Umsindisi, Chimata-no-kami, and Typhoon.

It is a Magellan-class J SEV, with a crew of up to 16 and an FTL Rating of 10.  It's equipped with two Class D Lifeboats, one configured as a science facility, the other as a relief boat, along with 12 Class A EEV pods.  It carries four Daihotai series 8×8 Tractors, four Alphatech XT-37C 4×4 off-road vehicles, two EVA-7C salvage and rescue pods and two heavy excavators.  It has cryosleep beds for 18 people, and MedPods for 12 seriously injured patients.

The UNCSS Solovetsky Island can carry up to 100 for short journeys or in an emergency.  The cargo hold is full of humanitarian essentials with spare parts and tools for any everyday problem.  The crew is cross-trained in multiple disciplines, but would usually consist of the commander, two pilot-navigators, two mechanics, two security officers, one scientist, one prospector and the ICC Protocol Inspector.  In addition to the crew, the ship is equipped with two Working Joe androids, dubbed James and Miss Sophie by the crew.

The crew of the Solovetsky Island, as well as those of all other Great Mother Mission Science Exploration Vessels, are fitted with Personal Data Transmitters (PDTs, page 132 *** LINK *** of the core rulebook) that can be detected at a distance of 20 km.

THE PCS' CREW: The PCs' crew forms a vital part of the campaign, as they will be along for the ride.  Some will be antagonists, distrustful of the PCs and seeking to out-maneuver them at every turn.  Others will become friends and help the PCs when they least expect it.  Some may die and will not only have an impact on the PCs when they do, but may need replacing with a new crew member from the UNCSS Ìyánlá.

comment.value: EMERGENCY ESCAPE VEHICLE: All ICC sanctioned starcraft are required by law to have EEV pods or escape shuttles to accommodate the ship’s entire crew complement. This is not always enforced. (see Notes)
comment.label: Text

notes.notes:
CLASS A EJECTION POD

CAPACITY: 1

LENGTH: 2m

Designed for ejection in space only, the coffin-shaped ejection pod has limited thrust capability but can put an occupant in a state of semi-stasis for up to a week to prolong the possibility of rescue.

comment.value: ADDED HARDPOINTS: You add one more hardpoint to your ship, of the same size as your current biggest hardpoint or smaller. This upgrade can be purchased twice.

comment.value: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE: An advanced computer mainframe, capable of running the ship when the crew is in cryo sleep. Weyland-Yutani’s MU/TH/UR and Seegson’s A.P.O.L.L.O. are the two most popular models.
comment.label: Text

appearance.value: Power-hungry, violent but logical.  While Zhāngjié's philosophy is “might is right” he tries to rule benevolently.  However, if his authority is challenged, he will respond with furious anger. Zhāngjié believes the Engineer pyramid on May Outpost holds a secret that will secure his future as a conquering hero, if he can find a way to explore it safely.
appearance.label: appearance

system.notes:
WARLORD ZHĀNGJIÉ

Power-hungry, violent but logical.  While Zhāngjié's philosophy is “might is right” he tries to rule benevolently.  However, if his authority is challenged, he will respond with furious anger.  Zhāngjié believes the Engineer pyramid on May Outpost holds a secret that will secure his future as a conquering hero, if he can find a way to explore it safely.

comment.value: You can use Command to give orders in combat as a fast action instead of a slow action. This is effect means you can give orders twice in the same Round.

comment.value:
Armor piercing.

A short recoil operated weapon, this Chinese manufactured pistol has been the standard sidearm of the UPP since they absorbed the CANC in 2164.

Rarely available for sale on the black market, the QSZ-203 fires 5.8mm rounds that have excellent armor piercing capabilities.

Also the producers of the AK-4047 Pulse Rifle, Norcomm is the UPP firearms production division of the People’s Army.

Like the 4047, the 203 can be thrown off a three-story roof and still function just fine. Norcomm builds them to last.
comment.label: Text

comment.value: TWO SHOTS
comment.label: Text

comment.value: You can carry twice as many objects as normal without being encumbered.
comment.label: Text

comment.value: A common tool used to open unpowered airlocks and divert power to or from electrical junction boxes. Gives a +1 modification to Heavy Machinery in relevant situations.
comment.label: Text

appearance.value:
Nowhere near as advanced as Weyland Corp or Hyperdyne's synthetics, these Working Joes are simply designed to follow basic instructions and perform menial tasks.

They have cheap rubberized skin that gives them the appearance of animated mannequins.
appearance.label: appearance

agenda.value: James and Miss Sophie, like the other Working Joes on the Great Mother Mission, are secretly slaved to MU/TH/UR 9000, allowing her to take direct control of them.
agenda.label: agenda

system.notes:
CODEPENDENT OPERATION:
Working Joes can only perform limited pre-programmed actions unless synced to an APOLLO or 1VAN/3 computer. All adaptation and cognitive thought come from their computer link up. In effect, they are disposable bodies for their control computer. The mainframe can temporarily add its own skills to a Working Joe’s for one Round (see the core rule book for mainframe attributes).

FACTORY STANDARD:
All Working Joes have the same attributes.

ANDROID FLAW—SUBSTANDARD COMPONENTS:
Like UPP androids, Working Joes are made on the cheap. Any critical injury on this model of synthetic always triggers two rolls on the chart for critical injuries on synthetics in the ALIEN RPG core rulebook.

comment.value: You can roll for Stamina using Wits instead of Strength.

comment.value:
Stress Level +1 per dose. 

Fast acting supplement that keeps you going well past your bedtime. Excessive use can cause stroke or heart attack. Each dose increases your Stress Level one step but removes the need for sleep for one day. During that day, you cannot relieve stress.
comment.label: Text

comment.value:
Reduces Stress Level to zero. 
(Reduce stress to 0 on character sheet when activated)

An injectable instant pain reliever for all strains, stresses, and irritations. Recommended for use during any self-inflicted caesarean performed to extract an unconventional fetus from the womb. Immediately reduces the patient's Stress Level to zero. Warning: an overdose of Naproleve can have an intoxicating effect. Each dose beyond the first in the same Shift gives a -1 modification to all Agility based skill rolls until the end of the Shift.
comment.label: Text

comment.value: Between fights, you release the tension in your team with some friendly banter. Your Stress Level, and the Stress Level of everyone in Short Range of you, drops two steps (instead of one) for every Turn spent in a safe place. Having several Marines with this talent doesn't increase the effect.
comment.label: Text

comment.value:
ARMOR PIERCING.

The most recent of the Grach series, the 4043 has overcome some of the earlier design flaws that made this the most beautiful but most under-performing pistol in the SOF armory.  The 4043 is the pinnacle of UPP small arms design, carried by senior officers who are forced to earn the right to use one.
comment.label: Text

Built-in comm unit.

name: Children of the Two Divines Devotee

prototypeToken.name: Children of the Two Divines Devotee

comment.value: You don't like being told what to do. You get a +2 modification to opposed rolls for Manipulation whenever someone tries to give you orders. This talent can also be used to resist the Officer's career talent Pull Rank.
comment.label: Text

comment.value: Standard issue for the USCMC, the Mk.35 is an unfortunately bulky combat pressure suit with a cumbersome recycler unit. You want to be careful wearing one of these in a fight, as the hard joints tend to seize up with extreme motion. While the inexpensive suit offers full protection from the vacuum of space, you have to spend time in a decompression chamber after spacewalking in one. Basically, this suit sucks, but if the choice is a Mk.35 or the cold of space, shut up and suit up. Armor Rating 5, Maximum Air Supply 4. Heavy Item.
comment.label: Text

notes.notes: Agility -1, Air Supply 4

comment.value: This updated version of the Rexim EVA Pistol is slowly being distributed to the Weyland-Yutani commercial fleet.  An RXF-M5A3 comes standard with a LAG light dial to increase damage and a 4x20 scope—if the scope is removed, the pistol has no bonus.
comment.label: Text

comment.value:
Armor piercing, Single-shot.

The DV-303 is a construction tool that uses expanding bolts to make emergency hull repairs. The DV-303 can be turned into an improvised weapon-firing bolts like a single round shotgun- a trick first used by Frontier rebels in the early 2100's. This weapon must be reloaded (slow action) after each shot.
comment.label: Text

comment.value:
These are the more extreme drugs out there that most ethical corporations work to keep off their colonies. These X-drugs increase strength, endurance, and the senses, but prolonged use can result in severe side effects such as hallucinations, seizures, psychosis, and stroke. The Colonial Marine Corps is rumoured to be experimenting with new powerful X-Stims for its soldiers, and some unscrupulous companies quietly supply their workers with similar illegal stimulants in an effort to increase productivity. 

Effects and prices vary.
comment.label: Text

comment.value: You don't run and hide when the going gets tough. Instead of panicking in the face of mortal danger, you can turn your fear into aggression and use it as a weapon against your enemy. You can trigger the Overkill effect when you make a Panic Roll.
comment.label: Text

Built-in comm unit.

Full auto.

The UPP equivalent to the M41A Pulse Rifle, the AK-4047 is a cheap and reliable substitute.
As such, the weapon often winds up in the hands of mercenaries and insurgents.
While not as accurate as the M41A, the AK-4047 is sturdier than the USCMC weapon.
An AK-4047 still works after being thrown off a cliff and left underwater for a month.
comment.label: Text

comment.value:
Blast 9.  For U1/U4. or U1/U4. MEDIUM range when used as a hand grenade.

Designed for the U1 and U4 grenade launchers, the High Explosive Dual Purpose M40 can also be used as a hand grenade.
To use these U1 rounds as a thrown explosive, the red plastic cap must be removed and the trigger under it depressed.
Three seconds later, the grenade will explode.
The UPP has an equivalent made by Norcomm.
comment.label: Text

comment.value: The interests of the company always come first, no matter what. And you represent the company. That means your own safety is paramount-other crew members are expendable. If you are attacked or otherwise end up in fatal danger, and if another PC or friendly NPC is within Short range (the same zone), you can make a Manipulation roll (straight roll, not opposed, and does not count as an action). If you succeed, you see the threat coming and find a clever way to make the other character suffer the attack or hazard instead of you. Using this talent increases your Stress Level by one.
comment.label: Text

comment.value:
Coordinate info for fields teams.

A personal data tablet, a P-DAT can be synced with Spectrograph Mapping Devices, PDT's, and helmet cams to coordinate a team on the go.
comment.label: Text
Text

comment.value: You are used to taking a beating. You increase your health by +2, i.e. your maximum number is equal to your Strength plus 2.
comment.label: Text

comment.label: Text

comment.value: When you are Broken, you can get back on your feet immediately, without anyone give you first aid. Roll for Stamina. For every Success you roll, you get one Health point back and can keep fighting a little while longer. This talent can only be used once per Turn, and has no effect against critical injuries.
comment.label: Text

comment.value: The plastic suit provides protection from biochemical contaminants as long as no damage has pierced it.  Biohazard suits have a built-in comm unit and Air Supply 2.  They do not protect against the vacuum of space.
comment.label: Text

items.name: Weyland ES-7 Supernova Dual-Action Electrostatic Shockgun

comment.value:
Stun effect, armor piercing.

These electrostatic kinetic energy projectile weapons fire armor piercing rounds that carry a stun charge. Any human target that suffers damage from an attack must make a hard STAMINA roll (−2, doesn’t count as an action) or be stunned for one Round, unable to act.
comment.label: Text

comment.value: Designed for non-lethal crowd control and used by Colonial Marshals, these kinetic impact shells work with shotguns and shockguns.  These rubber projectiles can incapacitate without killing.  Armor is doubled and any critical injuries from these rounds will be #16, #24, or #33 (equal chance of each).
comment.label: Text

comment.value:
Stun effect, armor piercing.

Developed a century ago, this electrostatic kinetic energy projectile weapon uses charged elements to fire high-speed armor piercing rounds.

Each bullet carries a charge that has a stunning effect.
Any human target that suffers damage from an attack must make a hard STAMINA roll (–2, doesn’t count as an action) or be stunned for one Round, unable to act.
The ES-4 has a tell-tale blue muzzle-flash when fired.

While a quality weapon, the pistol fell out of use before the Weyland-Yutani merger due to its cost and upkeep requirements—if not cleaned properly each day (takes one Turn), a shot fired will sometimes—if two or more Stress Dice turn stun the shooter as well.

While it can mostly be found in use amongst high level corporate security teams from the ICSC, a select number of Colonial Marshal offices are testing out a newer model as their standard sidearm on the Frontier—along with a pair of insulator gloves.
comment.label: Text

comment.value:
Stun effect (-2).  (Range Medium when used as a hand grenade.)

These grenades are called "electronic ballbreakers" with good reason. When deployed, they propel themselves about 3 feet off the ground before releasing a mega-voltage electric pulse. The usually non-lethal shock is still strong enough to freeze a person's central nervous system. These weapons are good for crowd control. When there is only one seat left on the last shuttle to leave a space station stuck in a decaying orbit around a gas giant, pop a few of these puppies into the mob, cycle that airlock closed, and strap yourself in for the ride home. All humans in the target zone must make a hard Stamina roll (-2, doesn't count as an action) or be stunned for one round.
comment.label: Text

comment.value: With rank comes certain priviliges-being obeyed is one of them. You can push any skill roll based on Empathy twice, not just once like other characters. Each push increases your Stress Level by one.
comment.label: Text

comment.value: You exude authority, from your personality, your position in the Company, your place on the command team or because the force of law is behind you. If you fail a COMMAND roll you can immediately, as a free action, attempt a MANIPULATION roll to try and salvage the situation.
comment.label: Text

comment.value: The hairs on the back of your neck stand up when enemies lurk nearby. You get a +2 modification to Observation when trying to spot a sneak attack.
comment.label: Text

Troubleshoot computer systems.

the SSDD is used to troubleshoot computer and mechanical systems aboard a space station or starship. A good engineer knows how to use one of these to hack doors and computer terminals-but you didn't read that here (Comtech +2)
comment.label: Text

Access and process date (Comtech roll).

A computer terminal is any colony, starship, or station based electronic hardware that can access and process data via keyboard or voice commands and monitor, or hologram. Using the right codes and Comtech rolls at a terminal can potentially give you access to whatever MU/TH/UR or A.P.O.L.L.O. knows.

Cost varies.

comment.value: You know the delicate art of stopping a wound from bleeding or treating grave injuries. You get a +2 modification to Medical Aid when treating someone who is about to die from a critical injury.

comment.value: You have a canny knack for seeing the terrain in a way no one else can, and getting your vehicle safely where it needs to go. You gain +2 to all PILOTING rolls when driving a ground or submersible vehicle.

comment.value: This EVA hard suit has fully-articulated rotary joints and self-actuating fingers, offering a limited range of mobility, but the maximum amount of protection from the hazards of space. The helmet has a sophisticated heads-up display built in, and the suit has its own thrusters for tether-free zero-G manoeuvres. The comm array on a standard Eco EVA Suit is unshielded, and thus sensitive to rogue transmissions. Armor Rating 4, Maximum Air Supply 6. Heavy Item.
comment.label: Text

comment.value:
Armor piercing, full auto, grenade launcher.

The standard issue weapon of the USCMC, the M41A Pulse Rifle is a 10mm automatic assault rifle with underslung 30mm pump-action grenade launcher combined in a sturdy housing with retractable stock and optional scope. The M41A fires explosive-tip caseless standard light armor-piercing US M309 rounds accelerated via electronic pulse. Remaining ammo is tracked via an LED counter and the rifle has two firing modes-burst and full automatic. An otherwise reliable weapon, the M41A can jam when fully-loaded, so partially loaded magazines are recommended. (In their downtime on missions, Marines will take the time to remove a few rounds from each of the magazines they carry.) Even with this flaw, the M41A is what you want slung over your shoulder-but if you are a civilian, good luck getting a permit to own one.
comment.label: Text

comment.value:
Long range indoors.

A motion-scanning device, the M314 uses high-powered ultrasonic waves to detect movement within its sensor range (Extreme range in open terrain, Long range in close quarters). Originally designed for rescue teams searching for civilians trapped in cave-ins and collapsed buildings, the tracker soon found use by the military fighting guerrilla forces in extrasolar environments that made infrared impractical. You need to make a Power Supply roll after every use. Its battery has a Power Supply level of 5 when fully charged.

The tracker will automatically detect the presence of any large moving objects within Long range (up to four zones) indoors and Extreme range outdoors, and let you know which zone they are in. Note that the motion tracker will only detect moving objects.
Detecting an enemy with a motion tracker doesn't mean you have spotted it and can engage it in combat-for that, you need to be in the same zone as the enemy or have line of sight to it. If the enemy is small or well hidden, you can try to spot it with an Observation roll.
comment.label: Text

name: UNCSS Ìyánlá Senior Flight Officer, Captain Tadesse Kondwani

prototypeToken.name: UNCSS Ìyánlá Senior Flight Officer, Captain Tadesse Kondwani

items.name: Like the Back of Your Hand

comment.value: This vehicle is yours, and you know every bolt and calbe, nook and cranny. Choose one vehicle or spacecraft (not one type, but a single, specific craft). You get a +2 modification to Piloting with the chosen vehicle. You can choose this talent several times, once for each vehicle.
comment.label: Text

comment.value:
Built-in comm unit.

Standard issue for the USCMC, the M3 consists of a rigid armor padded vest, a flexible ballistic pad that covers the abdomen, and clamshell greaves on the lower legs. The armor protects against edged weapons and glancing blows from high powered ammunition. It has a built-in comm unit and Personal Data Transmitter, combat webbing straps to connect a variety of equipment, and contact points which monitor the wearer's vitals and transmit them to a tactical monitoring station. Armor rating 6.
comment.label: Text

comment.value:
ARMOR PIERCING, FULL AUTO

Underslung shotgun.

The 150 year old Weyland Corp Storm Rifle was a design ahead of its time.  In addition to being a state-of-the-art assault weapon, the Storm Rifle has a long-range sniper function capable of hitting a target five kilometers away.  Like most Weyland Corp products, this advanced and very expensive rifle was intended as a showcase of Weyland ingenuity.  It was never intended to be put into mass production, but a misread memo saw it distributed to over 7,000 colonial peace-keeping missions during the height of the Weyland Era.

The Storm Rifle was retired at the turn of the century.  When Armat was invited to create a weapon to replace the USCMC Harrington Assault Rifle in 2170, they drew upon the Storm Rifle's plans to make an updated and economized version of this masterpiece.
comment.label: Text

comment.value: A Personal Medkit contains what you need to stop bleeding, disinfect a wound and cauterize it, some Pharmax bandages to wrap it up and a stim boost to keep you on your feet. A Medkit is not a permanent solution, it's more of a band aid to keep your guts from spilling out until you reach an Auto-Doc. Gives a +2 modification to Medical Aid rolls but can only be used once.

comment.value: The All Purpose Environment Suit is specialized, armored compression garb designed for combat and animal control under adverse environmental conditions. While an APEsuit cannot protect you from the vacuum of space, it does offer a filtered air supply, limited armor, resistance to temperature extremes, and is impervious to caustic substances. The helmet includes protective eyewear and a mask to protect the wearer's face. The suit is commonly worn by Weyland-Yutani's security commandos and "Dog Catcher" units to contain hostile organisms, so if you see a bunch of guys show up wearing these, get the hell out of there-because what they are looking for just might find you. Armor Rating 3, bonus +3 to Survival rolls. Air Supply 4.

appearance.value:
REFUGEE FROM THE CHILDREN OF THE TWO DIVINES

Selfless, hopeful but world-weary, Okafor cannot now understand how he was swept-up by the Children of the Two Divines. He has not seen a Xenomorph, the “Angel,” although he knows the Ovomorph in his crashed ship has something to do with it.
appearance.label: appearance

system.notes:
CHIKONDI OKAFOR

REFUGEE FROM THE CHILDREN OF THE TWO DIVINES

Selfless, hopeful but world-weary, Okafor cannot now understand how he was swept-up by the Children of the Two Divines. He has not seen a Xenomorph, the “Angel,” although he knows the Ovomorph in his crashed ship has something to do with it.

He has witnessed the infection that the Perfected spread, not least in Mother Ma'Kayla herself, and all he wants now is a place to live in peace. He fears Mother Ma'Kayla will come looking for them, and desperately wants to find greater safety—he sees the PCs as his way to achieve it. Despite being under house arrest, he will attract the PCs' attention and beg for their help. If the PCs ask about the Children of the Two Divines he will trade his knowledge of the cult, and the Ovomorph in his crashed ship, in return for help and protection.

system.notes:
LEONARD LESPERA

WORKERS' LEADER

Outgoing, caring but bitter, Lespera is the highly respected leader of the workers. While he appears to support the chief executives, he is angry at their decision to tamper with the atmosphere processor. It cost two workers’ lives to the ferals to do it, and the workers and jungle suffer for it. He has been quietly stoking the growing resentment that is simmering against the Weylanders. He genuinely likes Vidan and only this stops him rebelling openly. If Vidan is removed from power or harmed, Lespera will start the revolt. He wants peace for the people but will hint to the PCs that unrest is just beneath the surface.

appearance.value: The ferals have lived like vermin for 40 years, following their instincts to survive. They can't remember when the urge to eat flesh became so overwhelming that any flesh would do. That so many were seduced by the same insanity made it more acceptable, and soon it became the norm. Complete was their fall into barbarism.
appearance.label: appearance

system.notes:
THE FERALS

The ferals have lived like vermin for 40 years, following their instincts to survive. They can't remember when the urge to eat flesh became so overwhelming that any flesh would do. That so many were seduced by the same insanity made it more acceptable, and soon it became the norm. Complete was their fall into barbarism.

The ferals are wild barbarians, the apparent evil nemesis in this story, but they are victims of the Isolation too.  The PCs can rescue them from their dark path and get them treatment for their psychoses. Until then, the ferals will be immediately hostile but are weakened by the phosgene poisoning. If a feral is captured, it may be possible to help them. The PCs will need to make a successful MEDICAL AID roll with a -2 modification, and a Turn of psychotherapy, to make the feral cooperative and sufficiently trusting to allow the PCs to help them. If not, they are too far gone, and will need restraining and full hospital treatment to have any hope of recovery.

Beastly and savage, the feral moves with the graceful intent of a tiger on the hunt, their eyes sharp and reflexes at the ready. With blood-stained teeth and cracked nails, scarred bodies, and ripped skin, they carry their wounds proudly. They wear almost nothing, torn rags tied in haphazard knots, but always hold their weapons, their spears and bone knives, in readiness. In that moment of calm, you see a flicker in their eyes, of recognition, of humanity? And then they burst into action, stabbing, swiping, grappling, to snare another victim to be dragged screaming into the jungle.

WEYLANDER CHIEF EXECUTIVE

Old, indulgent, and kind-hearted, Vidan has led the cliff-dwellers for years and enjoys the privileges his rank brings.
appearance.label: appearance

agenda.value:
Sympathetic to Okafor and the refugees, Vidan wants them to be accepted into the community. The other chief executives, Dzuma and Yen, disagree. Vidan regrets they could never make peace with the Ferals, as there must be some humanity left in them somewhere.

He wants the PCs' help to make his community safer. He will also ask if they know of the Children of the Two Divines, as he wants to convince the community to welcome the refugees. Whatever the PCs say, Vidan will see the refugees as victims needing his help.
agenda.label: agenda

They gain sustenance from a form of electro-synthesis, with the ability to detect the warmth and energy from powered systems and absorb it. They are easily agitated and excitable. Usually found in small groups, they are most dangerous when they act as a swarm.

system.notes:
BRIGADIER XÌN WŎ

SECOND IN COMMAND AND HEAD OF INTELLIGENCE

Honorable, insightful and with a great sense of fair play, Xìn Wŏ is Warlord Zhāngjié's right hand. An expert combat leader, she holds the loyalty of the troops. Since the UPP arrived, she's been having ever greater reservations about them. Their methods have no dignity or honor, something she quietly loathes. She agrees with Zhāngjié that power through strength is the best way to build a secure community, but it must be honorable, even if she and the Warlord have not always lived up to that ideal.

She wants to ensure power remains with the Cooperative, so they can negotiate the best deal for their people from the newcomers, and not be strong-armed by these UPP barbarians.

comment.value:
Full auto.

The UPP equivalent to the M41A Pulse Rifle, the AK-4047 is a cheap and reliable substitute.
As such, the weapon often winds up in the hands of mercenaries and insurgents.
While not as accurate as the M41A, the AK-4047 is sturdier than the USCMC weapon.
An AK-4047 still works after being thrown off a cliff and left underwater for a month.
comment.label: Text

appearance.value:
ROYAL MARINES

Resilient, obsessive, with only one thing to live for—to take revenge against Warlord Zhāngjié.
appearance.label: appearance

system.notes:
CAPTAIN HANNAH SNELL

ROYAL MARINES

Resilient, obsessive, with only one thing to live for—to take revenge against Warlord Zhāngjié. Ten years ago, when the defeat of the remaining marines was inevitable, Snell's commanding officer ordered her to take her unit and flee, to set up as partisans and continue the fight.  This she did with a heavy heart. Since then, the 16 surviving marines under her command have been a thorn in the side of the CANC, but never able to force an uprising, even with the resistance network.

She knows some important visitors have arrived (the UPP scouts) and is planning a raid to assassinate them. For now, she has returned to the old Royal Marine bunker in the Old Town, to await intelligence from Sheppard and the resistance.

notes.notes: A relatively lightweight vest made of woven metal fibers, the Kevlar Riot Vest is the personnel armor of choice for law enforcement and security details throughout the colonies. It offers limited protection from bullets, knives, and shrapnel.

comment.value: Armor piercing. Equipped with a folding bipod, muzzle flash suppressor and a fully adjustable stock, the RMC is the ROYAL MARINES semi-automatic electronic pulse sniper rifle of choice. If you manage to see what's lurking in the shadows before it sees you, you go ahead and take the shot.
comment.label: Text

comment.value: Armor piercing, full auto, grenade launcher.
comment.label: Text

appearance.value:
UPP COSMOS EXPLORATION CORPS

Honorable, ambitious but with a powerful sense of self-preservation, Drubov has found dealing with Zhāngjié difficult—not least because Drubov isn't a politician and Zhāngjié, as a former Colonel and now warlord, thinks he outranks him.
appearance.label: appearance

system.notes:
LIEUTENANT COLONEL VICTOR DRUBOV

UPP COSMOS EXPLORATION CORPS

Honorable, ambitious but with a powerful sense of self-preservation, Drubov has found dealing with Zhāngjié difficult—not least because Drubov isn't a politician and Zhāngjié, as a former Colonel and now warlord, thinks he outranks him. And this despite the gifts of modern armor and weapons. Drubov is desperate to get this outpost to sign on the dotted line as a member of the UPP before the PCs arrive. If he and his squad of five troopers and one Davydovich android have to investigate the pyramid as Zhāngjié's price, then so be it. If not, Drubov is not above a palace coup, killing the warlord and replacing him with his second in command, Wŏ.

If the PCs save Drubov's life in the pyramid, he will feel a strong sense of obligation to them. He will tell them to beware, as all is not as it seems on the Great Mother Mission.  He won't say any more unless the PCs succeed at a MANIPULATION roll, in which case he will add that some colonists may be more than they seem (referring to the SOF troops in hypersleep aboard the UNCSS Ìyánlá). He will say no more after that.

comment.value: You don't run and hide when the going gets tough. Instead of panicking in the face of mortal danger, you can turn your fear into aggression and use it as a weapon against your enemy. You can trigger the Overkill effect when you make a Panic Roll.
comment.label: Text

comment.value: When you are Broken, you can get back on your feet immediately, without anyone give you first aid. Roll for Stamina. For every Success you roll, you get one Health point back and can keep fighting a little while longer. This talent can only be used once per Turn, and has no effect against critical injuries.
comment.label: Text

comment.value:
Built-in comm unit.
Standard issue for the UPP, the 6B90 consists of a rigid armor padded vest, a flexible ballistic pad that covers the abdomen, and clamshell greaves on the lower legs. The armor protects against edged weapons and glancing blows from high powered ammunition. It has a built-in comm unit and Personal Data Transmitter, combat webbing straps to connect a variety of equipment, and contact points which monitor the wearer's vitals and transmit them to a tactical monitoring station. Armor rating 6.
comment.label: Text

comment.value:
Full auto.

The UPP equivalent to the M41A Pulse Rifle, the AK-4047 is a cheap and reliable substitute.
As such, the weapon often winds up in the hands of mercenaries and insurgents.
While not as accurate as the M41A, the AK-4047 is sturdier than the USCMC weapon.
An AK-4047 still works after being thrown off a cliff and left underwater for a month.
comment.label: Text

comment.value:
ARMOR PIERCING.

The most recent of the Grach series, the 4043 has overcome some of the earlier design flaws that made this the most beautiful but most under-performing pistol in the SOF armory.  The 4043 is the pinnacle of UPP small arms design, carried by senior officers who are forced to earn the right to use one.
comment.label: Text

appearance.value: Intrepid, eager but ruthless, Sheppard is the Speaker for the Union Mutual Society, and covertly a leader of the 3WE insurrectionists. He's not an unreasonable man, and while he would admit that general living standards under Zhāngjié have improved, he cannot forget at what cost—kidnappings, murder, and sacrifices.
appearance.label: appearance

system.notes:
STANLEY SHEPPARD

Intrepid, eager but ruthless, Sheppard is the Speaker for the Union Mutual Society, and covertly a leader of the 3WE insurrectionists. He's not an unreasonable man, and while he would admit that general living standards under Zhāngjié have improved, he cannot forget at what cost—kidnappings, murder, and sacrifices.

His network knows of the UPP visitors (he hasn't heard the term “UPP” and wouldn't understand it if he did). Despite the risk to himself he is desperate to meet the PCs and get their help (see the events The Insurrectionist's Message and The Raid).

comment.value: You're skilled at subduing an opponent without harming them. When you attack a humanoid opponent in close combat, you can declare that you are trying to subdue them. You then get a +2 modification to the attack, but if it hits, you don't inflict any damage. Instead, you hold your opponent in a grapple. Extra Success's rolled have no effect.
comment.label: Text

comment.value: You get a +2 modification to Close Combat if you sacrifice your fast action.
comment.label: Text

appearance.value: Courageous, spirited and optimistic, Bowers is relieved that rescue is on its way.
appearance.label: appearance

agenda.value: However, she is concerned for the safety of her husband, Captain Leland Barton.
agenda.label: agenda

system.notes:
ANNE BOWERS

PILOT, UNCSS TYPHOON

Courageous, spirited and optimistic, Bowers is relieved that rescue is on its way.  However, she is concerned for the safety of her husband, Captain Leland Barton.

comment.value: You like to go fast. Really fast. When piloting a spacecraft, you get a +2 modification to Piloting rolls for any Accerate or Decelerate actions.
comment.label: Text

comment.value:
Armor Rating 1, Air Supply 3. 
Built-in comm unit. Protects against chemical and biological contaminants and radiation.

This sealed bodysuit acts as protection against hazardous materials. The suit protects fully against chemical and biological contaminants as long as nothing has pierced it. It also acts as armor against radiation. Each time you suffer a Radiation Point, roll six Base Dice—if you roll one or more success, the Rad is absorbed by the suit. HAZMAT suits have a built-in comm unit and an Air Supply of 3. They do not protect against the vacuum of space.
comment.label: Text

notes.notes: This sealed bodysuit acts as protection against hazardous materials. The suit protects fully against chemical and biological contaminants as long as nothing has pierced it. It also acts as armor against radiation. Each time you suffer a Radiation Point, roll six Base Dice—if you roll one or more success, the Rad is absorbed by the suit. HAZMAT suits have a built-in comm unit and a limited air supply. They do not protect against the vacuum of space.

appearance.value:
SECURITY OFFICER, UNCSS TYPHOON

Frightened and pessimistic but not willing to go down without a fight, Rukmini has refused to join the Perfected.
appearance.label: appearance

agenda.value: He has been given time to reconsider his decision.  He doesn't know where Barton and Shields are. He will risk his life to save the PCs, given the chance.
agenda.label: agenda

system.notes:
AZAD RUKMINI

SECURITY OFFICER, UNCSS TYPHOON

Frightened and pessimistic but not willing to go down without a fight, Rukmini has refused to join the Perfected. He has been given time to reconsider his decision.  He doesn't know where Barton and Shields are. He will risk his life to save the PCs, given the chance.

comment.value: If someone within Short range of you is hit by an attack, you can dive in to take the hit. Roll for Mobility. It doesn't count as an action in combat. If you roll one or more Success's, you take the hit instead. You can push the roll.
comment.label: Text

comment.value:
Built-in comm unit.

Standard issue for the USCMC, the M3 consists of a rigid armor padded vest, a flexible ballistic pad that covers the abdomen, and clamshell greaves on the lower legs. The armor protects against edged weapons and glancing blows from high powered ammunition. It has a built-in comm unit and Personal Data Transmitter, combat webbing straps to connect a variety of equipment, and contact points which monitor the wearer's vitals and transmit them to a tactical monitoring station. Armor rating 6.
comment.label: Text

appearance.value:
COUNSELOR, UNCSS TYPHOON AND STAGE I PATHOGEN CARRIER

Resolute, stubborn and ready to die to stop the Perfected, Shields has pretended to go along with them. She can feel the infection within her and knows it can't be good.
appearance.label: appearance

agenda.value: When the Perfected were playing the Navigation Orrery she secretly recorded it on a data pad she has hidden within her suit. She will pass the data pad to a PC (this is the fifth campaign clue) and create a diversion to allow them to escape. She doesn't realize this, but in passing the data pad on, the PC receiving it must resist the infection (Virulence 6) she—as a Pathogen Carrier—unknowingly is contaminated with it.
agenda.label: agenda

system.notes:
GRÁINNE SHIELDS

COUNSELOR, UNCSS TYPHOON AND STAGE I PATHOGEN CARRIER

Resolute, stubborn and ready to die to stop the Perfected, Shields has pretended to go along with them. She can feel the infection within her and knows it can't be good. When the Perfected were playing the Navigation Orrery she secretly recorded it on a data pad she has hidden within her suit. She will pass the data pad to a PC (this is the fifth campaign clue) and create a diversion to allow them to escape. She doesn't realize this, but in passing the data pad on, the PC receiving it must resist the infection (Virulence 6) she—as a Pathogen Carrier—unknowingly is contaminated with it.

comment.value: When you block in close combat, you can use Agility instead of Strength.
comment.label: Text

comment.value:
Access and process date (Comtech roll).

A computer terminal is any colony, starship, or station based electronic hardware that can access and process data via keyboard or voice commands and monitor, or hologram. Using the right codes and Comtech rolls at a terminal can potentially give you access to whatever MU/TH/UR or A.P.O.L.L.O. knows.

Cost varies.
comment.label: Text

appearance.value:
CAPTAIN, UNCSS TYPHOON AND STAGE I PATHOGEN CARRIER

Grief-stricken and hopeless, Barton sees no way forward other than to seek Perfection.
appearance.label: appearance

agenda.value: He believes his wife, Ann Bowers—a security officer aboard the Typhoon—is dead, and in his desolate weakness, agreed to join the Perfected.  Now that he is infected there is no turning back.  If a PC touches him, they must make a Sickness Roll against Virulence 6 or become infected as a Stage I Abomination Pathogen Carrier.
agenda.label: agenda

system.notes:
LELAND BARTON

CAPTAIN, UNCSS TYPHOON AND STAGE I PATHOGEN CARRIER

Grief-stricken and hopeless, Barton sees no way forward other than to seek Perfection. He believes his wife, Ann Bowers—a security officer aboard the Typhoon—is dead, and in his desolate weakness, agreed to join the Perfected.  Now that he is infected there is no turning back.  If a PC touches him, they must make a Sickness Roll against Virulence 6 or become infected as a Stage I Abomination Pathogen Carrier.

comment.value: You exude authority, from your personality, your position in the Company, your place on the command team or because the force of law is behind you. If you fail a COMMAND roll you can immediately, as a free action, attempt a MANIPULATION roll to try and salvage the situation.
comment.label: Text

appearance.value:
GORHAM'S MARAUDERS ENGINEER

Reasonable, fair-minded, and conscientious, Klaassen is an engineering genius. She hates conflict but realizes the Perfected are an existential threat, although she believes that the devotees of the Children of the Two Divines must have been brain-washed and are victims too—they deserve a chance to be saved. She will fight to defend herself if she has to, but always prefers peaceful resolutions.
appearance.label: appearance

agenda.value: NOTE: Klaassen is suffering from critical injury #33 broken ribs.
agenda.label: agenda

system.notes:
DIJANA KLAASSEN

GORHAM'S MARAUDERS ENGINEER

Reasonable, fair-minded, and conscientious, Klaassen is an engineering genius. She hates conflict but realizes the Perfected are an existential threat, although she believes that the devotees of the Children of the Two Divines must have been brain-washed and are victims too—they deserve a chance to be saved. She will fight to defend herself if she has to, but always prefers peaceful resolutions.

comment.value: You get a +2 modification when you use Heavy Machinery or Comtech to repair damage to a spacecraft.
comment.label: Text

comment.value: The plastic suit provides protection from biochemical contaminants as long as no damage has pierced it.  Biohazard suits have a built-in comm unit and Air Supply 2.  They do not protect against the vacuum of space.
comment.label: Text

items.name: Weyland ES-7 Supernova Dual-Action Electrostatic Shockgun

comment.value:
Stun effect, armor piercing.

These electrostatic kinetic energy projectile weapons fire armor piercing rounds that carry a stun charge. Any human target that suffers damage from an attack must make a hard STAMINA roll (−2, doesn’t count as an action) or be stunned for one Round, unable to act.
comment.label: Text

comment.value: Designed for non-lethal crowd control and used by Colonial Marshals, these kinetic impact shells work with shotguns and shockguns.  These rubber projectiles can incapacitate without killing.  Armor is doubled and any critical injuries from these rounds will be #16, #24, or #33 (equal chance of each).
comment.label: Text

comment.value:
Stun effect (-2).  (Range Medium when used as a hand grenade.)

These grenades are called "electronic ballbreakers" with good reason. When deployed, they propel themselves about 3 feet off the ground before releasing a mega-voltage electric pulse. The usually non-lethal shock is still strong enough to freeze a person's central nervous system. These weapons are good for crowd control. When there is only one seat left on the last shuttle to leave a space station stuck in a decaying orbit around a gas giant, pop a few of these puppies into the mob, cycle that airlock closed, and strap yourself in for the ride home. All humans in the target zone must make a hard Stamina roll (-2, doesn't count as an action) or be stunned for one round.
comment.label: Text

comment.value:
Armor piercing, Single-shot.

The DV-303 is a construction tool that uses expanding bolts to make emergency hull repairs. The DV-303 can be turned into an improvised weapon-firing bolts like a single round shotgun- a trick first used by Frontier rebels in the early 2100's. This weapon must be reloaded (slow action) after each shot.
comment.label: Text

comment.value:
Armor piercing, Power Supply 5.

A utilitarian blowtorch used for both welding and cutting through metal. In a pinch, a cutting torch can be used as a weapon. The Rexim EVA pistol started life as a laser cutting torch. You want to stay alive? You need to improvise. You need to make a Power Supply roll after every use. Its battery has a Power Supply level of 5 when fully charged.
comment.label: Text

appearance.value:
GORHAM'S MARAUDERS SECURITY

Headstrong, athletic, and tough, Willamar is a notorious security officer in the Marauders' circles known for her take-no-prisoners approach to her enemies. She grew up with the young J.V.Gorham and is intensely loyal to her.
appearance.label: appearance

agenda.value: She intends to fight to the death—any attempt to convince her to surrender has a -2 modification.
agenda.label: agenda

system.notes:
MARTINA WILLAMAR

GORHAM'S MARAUDERS SECURITY

Headstrong, athletic, and tough, Willamar is a notorious security officer in the Marauders' circles known for her take-no-prisoners approach to her enemies. She grew up with the young J.V.Gorham and is intensely loyal to her. She intends to fight to the death—any attempt to convince her to surrender has a -2 modification.

comment.value: When the going gets tough, the tough get going, and you're the toughest badass around. You can push any skill roll based on Strength twice, not just once like other characters. Each push increases your Stress Level by one.
comment.label: Text

comment.value: The plastic suit provides protection from biochemical contaminants as long as no damage has pierced it.  Biohazard suits have a built-in comm unit and Air Supply 2.  They do not protect against the vacuum of space.
comment.label: Text

comment.value:
Stun effect, armor piercing.

Developed a century ago, this electrostatic kinetic energy projectile weapon uses charged elements to fire high-speed armor piercing rounds.

Each bullet carries a charge that has a stunning effect.
Any human target that suffers damage from an attack must make a hard STAMINA roll (–2, doesn’t count as an action) or be stunned for one Round, unable to act.
The ES-4 has a tell-tale blue muzzle-flash when fired.

While a quality weapon, the pistol fell out of use before the Weyland-Yutani merger due to its cost and upkeep requirements—if not cleaned properly each day (takes one Turn), a shot fired will sometimes—if two or more Stress Dice turn stun the shooter as well.

While it can mostly be found in use amongst high level corporate security teams from the ICSC, a select number of Colonial Marshal offices are testing out a newer model as their standard sidearm on the Frontier—along with a pair of insulator gloves.
comment.label: Text

items.name: Weyland ES-7 Supernova Dual-Action Electrostatic Shockgun

comment.value:
Stun effect, armor piercing.

These electrostatic kinetic energy projectile weapons fire armor piercing rounds that carry a stun charge. Any human target that suffers damage from an attack must make a hard STAMINA roll (−2, doesn’t count as an action) or be stunned for one Round, unable to act.
comment.label: Text

comment.value: Designed for non-lethal crowd control and used by Colonial Marshals, these kinetic impact shells work with shotguns and shockguns.  These rubber projectiles can incapacitate without killing.  Armor is doubled and any critical injuries from these rounds will be #16, #24, or #33 (equal chance of each).
comment.label: Text

comment.value:
Fire Intensity 9.

This carbine-style flamethrower uses naphtha fuel canisters to fire a thick, steady stream of flame at a target. It is in common use by the USCMC, who deploy the weapon at the squad and fireteam level. Civilian models exist too. The troops in the field have given the M240 the unceremonious nickname of "Bake-a-Flake." It's a good standby weapon to have in a pinch, especially when facing off against hostile organisms. Most animals retreat from fire, yes? Any target hit by the incinerator unit also catches fire, Intensity 9.
comment.label: Text

comment.value:
Stun effect (-2).  (Range Medium when used as a hand grenade.)

These grenades are called "electronic ballbreakers" with good reason. When deployed, they propel themselves about 3 feet off the ground before releasing a mega-voltage electric pulse. The usually non-lethal shock is still strong enough to freeze a person's central nervous system. These weapons are good for crowd control. When there is only one seat left on the last shuttle to leave a space station stuck in a decaying orbit around a gas giant, pop a few of these puppies into the mob, cycle that airlock closed, and strap yourself in for the ride home. All humans in the target zone must make a hard Stamina roll (-2, doesn't count as an action) or be stunned for one round.
comment.label: Text

appearance.value:
GORHAM'S MARAUDERS NAVIGATOR AND TRAITOR

Confused, bitter and resentful, Majken has been a Marauder for many years. However, she has decided fighting against the Perfected is fruitless.
appearance.label: appearance

agenda.value: This trip—with the help of her sabotage and a downloaded copy of the Spirit of Trafalgar's nav data—was the perfect opportunity. She needs to get to the Skritio Caves and give the data to her new masters The PCs can attempt an opposed MANIPULATION test to see that she is hiding something.
agenda.label: agenda

system.notes:
NESSA MAJKEN

GORHAM'S MARAUDERS NAVIGATOR AND TRAITOR

Confused, bitter and resentful, Majken has been a Marauder for many years. However, she has decided fighting against the Perfected is fruitless. She learned much from devotee prisoners, and knows they seek navigation data. This trip—with the help of her sabotage and a downloaded copy of the Spirit of Trafalgar's nav data—was the perfect opportunity. She needs to get to the Skritio Caves and give the data to her new masters The PCs can attempt an opposed MANIPULATION test to see that she is hiding something.

comment.label: Text

appearance.value:
GORHAM'S MARAUDERS MEDIC

Single-minded, determined and stoic, Ravindra has been a loyal follower of J.V.Gorham since the late days of her grandfather. 

NOTE: Ravindra is suffering from critical injury #41 to both his legs and cannot move.
appearance.label: appearance

agenda.value: He has seen much death and heartbreak and is determined to see the end of the Perfected and the Children of the Two Divines. Despite his injuries from the crash, he will not surrender and any attempt to convince him to, has a -2 modification.
agenda.label: agenda

system.notes:

GORHAM'S MARAUDERS MEDIC

Single-minded, determined and stoic, Ravindra has been a loyal follower of J.V.Gorham since the late days of her grandfather. He has seen much death and heartbreak and is determined to see the end of the Perfected and the Children of the Two Divines. Despite his injuries from the crash, he will not surrender and any attempt to convince him to, has a -2 modification.
